00028 namespace {
00030   SingletonUse<LogManager> s_log;
00031 
00038   void printHelp() {
00039     std::cout<<"Options:\n"
00040             <<"  Q :- quit\n"
00041             <<"  N :- next tick\n"
00042             <<"  G :- goto tick (e.g. g100)\n"
00043             <<"  P :- post the goals from the attached file\n"
00044             <<"       (e.g P goal.req)\n"
00045             <<"  K :- kill one reactor (e.g K foo)\n"      
00046             // <<"  W :- wrap the agent to tick 0\n"
00047             <<"  H :- print this help message"
00048             <<std::endl;
00049   }
00050 
00074   bool parseGoals(Agent &trex, std::string const &name) {
00075     bool found;
00076     std::string file = s_log->locate(name, found);
00077 
00078     if( !found ) {
00079       // try to add the .req extension
00080       file = s_log->use(name+".req", found);
00081     } else {
00082       s_log->use(file, found);
00083     }
00084 
00085     if( !found ) {
00086       std::cerr<<"Unable to locate file \""<<name<<"\""<<std::endl;
00087       return false;
00088     } else {
00089       try {
00090        std::cout<<"Loading \""<<file<<"\"... "<<std::flush;
00091        rapidxml::file<> xml_f(file.c_str());
00092        rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00093        doc.parse<0>(xml_f.data());
00094        rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node();
00095        if( NULL==root ) {
00096          std::cout<<"empty file"<<std::endl;
00097        } else {
00098          std::cout<<"done\nExtracting goals:"<<std::endl;
00099          ext_iterator iter(*root);
00100          trex.sendRequests(iter);
00101        }
00102        return true;
00103       }catch( rapidxml::parse_error const &xe ) {
00104        std::cerr<<"XML error on "<<xe.where<char>()
00105                <<": "<<xe.what()<<std::endl;
00106       }catch(Exception const &te) {
00107        std::cerr<<"TREX error "<<te<<std::endl;
00108       }catch( std::exception const &e ) {
00109        std::cerr<<"exception: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00110       } catch(...) {
00111        std::cerr<<"Unknown error"<<std::endl;
00112       }
00113       return false;
00114     }
00115   }
00116 }

00157 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00158   std::cout<<"This is TREX v"<<TREX::version::str()<<std::endl;
00159 
00160   if( argc<2 || argc>4 ) {
00161     std::cerr << "Invalid argument list:"
00162              <<"\n Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [steps]"
00163              << std::endl;
00164     return -1;
00165   }
00166   char *configFile = argv[1];
00167   std::auto_ptr<Clock> clk;
00168 
00169   if( argc>=3 )
00170     clk.reset(new StepClock(0, string_cast<size_t>(argv[2])));
00171   Agent agent(configFile, clk.release());
00172   agent.setClock(new StepClock(0, 60));
00173   agent.initComplete();
00174   printHelp();
00175   while( true ) {
00176     if( agent.missionCompleted() ) {
00177       std::cout<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00178       break;
00179     }
00180     TICK tick = agent.getCurrentTick();
00181     std::cout<<'['<<agent.getName()<<':'<<tick<<"]> ";
00182     std::string cmdString;
00183     std::cin>>cmdString;
00184 
00185     char const cmd = std::toupper(cmdString[0]);
00186     try {
00187       if( 'Q'==cmd ) {
00188        std::cout<<"Goodbye"<<std::endl;
00189        break;
00190       } else if( 'N'==cmd ) {
00191        while( agent.getCurrentTick()==tick && !agent.missionCompleted() )
00192          agent.doNext();
00193       } else if( 'G'==cmd ) {
00194        try {
00195          TICK targetTick = string_cast<TICK>(cmdString.substr(1));
00196          
00197          if( targetTick<=tick ) 
00198            std::cout<<"Tick "<<targetTick<<" is in the past."
00199                    // <<"\nYou can use W to wrap the agent to its initial tick."
00200                    <<std::endl;
00201          else {
00202            while( agent.getCurrentTick()<targetTick &&
00203                  !agent.missionCompleted() )
00204              agent.doNext();
00205          }  
00206        }catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00207          std::cout<<"Ill-formed g command"<<std::endl;
00208        }
00209       } else if( 'P'==cmd ) {
00210        std::string file;
00211        std::cin>>file;
00212        while( !file.empty() && std::isspace(file[0]) )
00213          file = file.substr(1);
00214        if( file.empty() ) {
00215          std::cerr<<"Missing file name"<<std::endl;
00216          printHelp();
00217        } else if( !parseGoals(agent, file) ) 
00218          printHelp();
00219       } else if( 'K'==cmd ) {
00220        std::string name;
00221        std::cin>>name;
00222        while( !name.empty() && std::isspace(name[0]) )
00223          name = name.substr(1);
00224        if( name.empty() ) {
00225          std::cerr<<"Missing reactor name"<<std::endl;
00226          printHelp();
00227        } else {
00228          Agent::reactor_iterator pos = agent.find_reactor(name);
00229          if( agent.reactor_end()==pos ) 
00230            std::cerr<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" not found."<<std::endl;
00231          else {
00232            agent.kill_reactor(*pos);
00233            std::cout<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" killed."<<std::endl;
00234          }
00235        }
00236       } else 
00237        printHelp();
00238     } catch( std::exception const & e) {
00239       std::cout<<"Caught an exception :"<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00240       break;
00241     } catch( ... ) {
00242       std::cout<<"Caught an unknown exception"<<std::endl;
00243       break;
00244     }
00245   }
00246   return 0;
00247 }
